This function can be used to retrieve the fog settings. The function returns a 4 element 1D array with the following information:
[0] = enabled toggle (a boolean, either <tt>true</tt> or <tt>false</tt>), default <tt>false</tt>
Note that you can change these values and pass the full array to the gpu_set_fog() function as a single argument.
4 element 1D Array (see above for array elements)

{ANY_CODE} var fog_a = gpu_get_fog();
fog_a[1] = c_red;
gpu_set_fog(fog_a);
The above code gets the current fog settings and then sets the colour element of the array to <tt>c_red</tt> before setting the fog again using the changed array.
